text: "Stop Draggin' My Heart Around" is a 1981 song by Stevie Nicks and Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers. It was the debut single from Nicks's debut studio album Bella Donna. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 4 in South Africa, number 5 in Canada, number 10 in Australia and number 11 in New Zealand. title: Stop Draggin' My Heart Around
